about_the_game:
Miss those good ol' days of classic retro 90's gameplay, before BOOST and the death of momentum? Feel abandoned after Mania?

Roskur Does What Sonican't.


Roskur's Run is an evolution of classic 90's "Hedgehog" physics-based platforming with a deeper move set, upgrades, and a non-linear world to explore. Experience a casual introduction to speed running with a unique game structure where you must shave your best times down to unlock world progression.
Enjoy perfect painstakingly painted pixel art in this fantasy adventure to delay Ragnarök. Climb the world tree to warn the eagle that sits atop it about Nidhogg's approaching reptilian horde. WILL YOU MAKE IT IN TIME?!?!

Only if you wishlist! Save Midgar you distinguished gamers with skill and taste!

name: Roskur's Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.10 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 515/ AMD Radeon HD 6450 or superior
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: INTEL Quad Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Devoted 3D Graphics Card: i.e. NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Roskur's Run is an evolution of classic 90's "Hedgehog" physics-based platforming with a deeper move set, upgrades, and a non-linear world to explore. The loop: Explore > Collect > Upgrade > SPEED RUN > Unlock > Explore
